desc: The EASIEST D.I.Y. Flagpole Kit! Quick set-up! Veteran Owned & Operated. On Sale Now! Old Glory Flagpole Kits! We sell the Best Sectional & Telescoping Flagpole available, made from 11 gauge Aluminum.

layout.text: Old Glory Flagpole is a Veteran Owned and Operated Flagpole company that specializes in high strength 11 Gauge residential poles. Our poles have been tested at winds 100 mph+, so you can buy with confidence.
